last_episode_to_air.name: Cam'ron
last_episode_to_air.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Rosemead, California, to meet Cam'ron superfan Flower. Flower is a single mother and a vegan chef whose crib has been overrun by the demands of both responsibilities. Cam'ron and Zeez step in to save the day, re-imagining Flower's house with uplifting color, custom furniture accents and New-Harlem attitude.

name: Hip Hop My House
overview: Harlem rapper Cam’ron brings his iconic style to this high-octane hip-hop makeover series with the help of interior designer Zeez Louize. Together they spin one lucky superfan’s crib into a larger-than-life tribute to rap icons, past and present.

episodes.name: Rae Sremmurd
episodes.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez visit K-Town, Los Angeles, to meet Rae Sremmurd superfan Akkaraj (AK). AK is a hyper-creative who needs his lackluster one bedroom apartment to serve multiple functions. Cam'ron and Zeez deliver a whimsical design with splashes of color and an ode to brotherly love.

episodes.name: Tyga
episodes.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Rowland Heights, California, to meet Tyga superfan Rashard. Rashard is a hairstylist and entrepreneur who is looking to transform his suburban bungalow into a Hip-Hop oasis. The duo dream up the ultimate pool party makeover.

episodes.name: Polo G
episodes.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Carson, California, to meet Polo G superfan Deshaun. Deshaun is a student, musician and military vet who needs help imagining a creative sanctuary. Cam'ron and Zeez convert his garage into a Chicago Loft inspired Hip Hop dream factory.

episodes.name: Migos
episodes.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez visit East Hollywood, Los Angeles, to meet Migos superfan Macoia. Macoia is an east-coast transplant who has recently overcome a series of personal challenges. Cam'ron and Zeez transform her studio apartment into a bright and uplifting shrine to the Atlanta icons.

episodes.name: Nelly
episodes.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez visit the San Fernando Valley to meet Nelly superfan Olivia. Olivia is a fitness instructor with deep Texan roots. Cam'ron and Zeez use Southern inspiration and Nelly's Midwest vibe to overhaul her drab apartment and bring in the 'Country Chic'.

episodes.name: 24KGoldn
episodes.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez are in Hollywood to meet 24KGoldn superfan, Kelechi. A successful college grad recently out of a relationship, Kelechi needs help to level up his bland living situation. Cam'ron and Zeez deliver a penthouse redesign inspired by Bay Area culture and all things 'Goldn'.

episodes.name: Erica Banks
episodes.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Compton, California, to meet Erica Banks superfan Lamanella (Lala). Lala is an entrepreneur and business coach looking to transform her South Central home into a 'Boss Babe Bungalow'. Cam'ron and Zeez take on one of their most challenging transformations to deliver a bright and bold Erica Banks inspired redesign.

episodes.name: A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie
episodes.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Hawthorne, California, to meet A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie superfan Mariah (Yaya). Yaya is a celebrity hair stylist and mother of two young daughters whose home space does not accommodate all her needs. Cam'ron and Zeez deliver a bold Hip Hop transformation that brings together Yaya's three loves: Home life, Hair do's and Hustle.

episodes.name: Cam'ron
episodes.overview: Cam'ron and Zeez visit Rosemead, California, to meet Cam'ron superfan Flower. Flower is a single mother and a vegan chef whose crib has been overrun by the demands of both responsibilities. Cam'ron and Zeez step in to save the day, re-imagining Flower's house with uplifting color, custom furniture accents and New-Harlem attitude.
